SELECT ci.id, ci.code, ci.name, ci.type, ci.price, ci.images, ci.content, ci.create_date AS createDate, ci.shop_id AS shopId, ci.on_put AS onPut, si.introduction, si.tag, ui.user_name AS userName, ui.avatar FROM commodity_info ci LEFT JOIN shop_info si ON ( ci.shop_id = si.id ) LEFT JOIN user_info ui ON ( ui.id = si.user_id ) WHERE 1 = 1
AND ui.user_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{commodityInfo.userName},'%')
AND ci.type LIKE CONCAT('%',#{commodityInfo.type},'%')
AND ci.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{commodityInfo.name},'%')
AND ci.on_put = #{commodityInfo.onPut}
ORDER BY ci.create_date DESC

SELECT ci.id, ci.`name`, ci.images, ui.user_name AS userName, ui.avatar, COUNT(oi.commodity_id) AS orderNum FROM commodity_info ci LEFT JOIN shop_info si ON si.id = ci.shop_id LEFT JOIN user_info ui ON ( si.user_id = ui.id ) LEFT JOIN order_info oi ON (oi.commodity_id = ci.id) WHERE 1 = 1 GROUP BY ci.id ORDER BY COUNT(oi.commodity_id) DESC limit 4

SELECT ci.id, ci.`name`, ci.images, ci.content, ci.price, ci.create_date AS createDate, ci.on_put AS onPut, ci.type, ui.id AS userId, ui.user_name AS userName, ui.avatar, si.id AS shopId, COUNT( oi.commodity_id ) AS orderNum FROM commodity_info ci LEFT JOIN shop_info si ON ( si.id = ci.shop_id ) LEFT JOIN user_info ui ON ( ui.id = si.user_id ) LEFT JOIN order_info oi ON ( oi.commodity_id = ci.id ) WHERE ci.id = #{ commodityId }
SELECT si.id, si.`code`, si.introduction, si.tag, ui.user_name AS userName, ui.avatar FROM shop_info si LEFT JOIN user_info ui ON ( ui.id = si.user_id ) WHERE 1 = 1

SELECT ci.id, ci.`name`, ci.images, ci.content, ci.price, ci.create_date AS createDate, ci.on_put AS onPut, ci.type, COUNT( oi.commodity_id ) AS orderNum FROM commodity_info ci LEFT JOIN shop_info si ON ( si.id = ci.shop_id ) LEFT JOIN order_info oi ON ( oi.commodity_id = ci.id ) WHERE ci.shop_id = #{ shopId } GROUP BY ci.id

SELECT si.id, si.`code` AS shopCode, si.introduction, si.tag, ai.status_date AS statusDate, ui.user_name AS userName, ui.avatar FROM shop_info si LEFT JOIN user_info ui ON ( ui.id = si.user_id ) LEFT JOIN audit_info ai ON ( ai.user_id = ui.id ) WHERE 1 = 1 AND si.id = #{ shopId }

SELECT ci.id, ci.`name`, ci.images, ci.content, ci.price, ci.create_date AS createDate, ci.on_put AS onPut, ci.type, COUNT( oi.commodity_id ) AS orderNum FROM commodity_info ci LEFT JOIN shop_info si ON ( si.id = ci.shop_id ) LEFT JOIN order_info oi ON ( oi.commodity_id = ci.id ) WHERE ci.shop_id = #{ shopId } GROUP BY ci.id
